_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Five detrimental things that lead to the: Lack of respect and reverence for the Teacher
Lack of respect and reverence for the teaching
Lack of respect and reverence for the Saṅgha
Lack of respect and reverence for the training
Lack of respect and reverence for immersion
Five things that lead to the continuatio: Maintaining respect and reverence for the Teacher
Maintaining respect and reverence for the teaching
Maintaining respect and reverence for the Saṅgha
Maintaining respect and reverence for the training
Maintaining respect and reverence for immersion
